name: Creepy Mansion (David Nikolovski)
description:
2.5D side scroller/puzzle solving game utilising ghost-like mechanics with challenging aspects throughout each level.

Controls: 

  • A and D to move left and right
  • Space to jump
  • Scroll wheel to change lanes
  • R to change to ghost companion
  • Left click to use weapon
  • Right click to pick up crates
